marytts.tools.dbselection
Class DBHandler

java.lang.Object
  marytts.tools.dbselection.DBHandler

public class DBHandler
extends java.lang.Object

Various functions for handling connection, inserting and querying a mysql database.

Author:
Marcela Charfuelan, Holmer Hemsen.

Method Detail

setSelectedSentencesTableName

public void setSelectedSentencesTableName(java.lang.String name)
By default the name of the selected sentence is "locale + _selectedSentences" with this function the name can be changed, the locale prefix will be kept and the suffix "_selectedSentences". NOTE: If the name is changed this function should be called before calling createDBConnection() because ther prepared statments for each table are initialised.

Parameters:
name -

createDBConnection

public boolean createDBConnection(java.lang.String host,
                                  java.lang.String db,
                                  java.lang.String user,
                                  java.lang.String passwd)
The createDBConnection method creates the database connection.

Parameters:
host - a String value. The database host e.g. 'localhost'.
db - a String value. The database to connect to.
user - a String value. Database user that has excess to the database.
passwd - a String value. The 'secret' password.
Returns:
true if connection was succesfull, false otherwise

loadPagesWithMWDumper

public void loadPagesWithMWDumper(java.lang.String xmlFile,
                                  java.lang.String lang,
                                  java.lang.String host,
                                  java.lang.String db,
                                  java.lang.String user,
                                  java.lang.String passwd)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
Use mwdumper for extracting pages from a XML wikipedia dump file. The mwdumper reads a xml wikipedia file and extract the tables "text", "page" and "revision" in sql format. In this configuration the mwdumper creates a connection to the DB and load directly the tables, so the tables must be already created and they should be empty. Here these tables are created empty using the function createEmptyWikipediaTables, this function deletes any existing text, page and revision table before creating new ones.

Parameters:
xmlFile - xml dump file
lang - locale language
host -
db -
user -
passwd -
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

true if user answers false otherwise.

Parameters:

createEmptyWikipediaTables

public boolean createEmptyWikipediaTables()
This function creates empty text, page and revision tables (without locale prefix). If the tables already exist it will delete them.

Returns:
true if the tables were created succesfully, false otherwise.

addLocalePrefixToWikipediaTables

public void addLocalePrefixToWikipediaTables()
Rename the Wikipedia tables adding the prefix locale: locale_text locale_page and locale_revision. if any of the locale_* tables exist will be deleted before renaming the table.

deleteWikipediaTables

public void deleteWikipediaTables()
Delete the Wikipedia tables: locale_text, locale_page and locale_revision tables.

public boolean checkWikipediaTables()
check if tables: locale_text, locale_page and locale_revision exist.

Returns:

insertSentence

public void insertSentence(java.lang.String sentence,
                           byte[] features,
                           boolean reliable,
                           boolean unknownWords,
                           boolean strangeSymbols,
                           int cleanText_id)
Insert processed sentence in dbselection

Parameters:
sentence - text of the sentence.
features - features if sentences is reliable.
reliable - true/false.
unknownWords - true/false.
strangeSymbols - true/false.
cleanText_id - the id of the cleanText this sentence comes from.

                                   boolean unwanted)

Parameters:
dbselection_id -
unwanted -

insertWordList

public void insertWordList(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> wordList)
Creates a wordList table, if already exists deletes it and creates a new to insert current wordList.

closeDBConnection

public void closeDBConnection()

getNumberOfReliableSentences

public int getNumberOfReliableSentences()

getIdListOfType

public int[] getIdListOfType(java.lang.String table,
                             java.lang.String condition)
Get a list of id's

Parameters:
table - cleanText, wordList, dbselection (no need to add locale) (NOTE: this function does not work for the selectedSentences table, for this table use the function getIdListOfSelectedSentences ).
condition - reliable, unknownWords, strangeSymbols, selected, unwanted = true/false (combined are posible: "reliable=true and unwanted=false"); or condition=null for querying without condition.
Returns:
int array or null if the list of id's is empty.

getIdsAndFeatureVectors

public Pair<int[],byte[][]> getIdsAndFeatureVectors(java.lang.String table,
                                                    java.lang.String condition)
For the set of sentences identified by table and condition, retrieve from Mysql both the sentence ids and the corresponding features.

Parameters:
table -
condition -
Returns:

getIdListOfSelectedSentences

public int[] getIdListOfSelectedSentences(java.lang.String actualTableName,
                                          java.lang.String condition)
Get a list of id's from a selected sentences table.
NOTE: use the actual table name: local + tableName + selectedsentences

Parameters:
lang - language locale of the table
actualTableName - = locale_tableName_selectedSentences
condition - unwanted=true/false
Returns:

getNumberOfWords

public int getNumberOfWords(int maxFrequency)
Get number of words in the wordList table.

Parameters:
maxFreq - max frequency of a word to be considered in the list, if maxFrequency=0 it will retrieve all the words with frequency>=1.
Returns:
int number of words.

getMostFrequentWords

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getMostFrequentWords(int numWords,
                                                                                  int maxFrequency)
Get the most frequent words and its frequency in a HashMap.

Parameters:
numWords - max number of words to retrieve, if numWords=0 then it will retrieve all the words in the list in descending order of frequency.
maxFreq - max frequency of a word to be considered in the list, if maxFrequency=0 it will retrieve all the words with frequency>=1.

getMostFrequentWordsArray

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMostFrequentWordsArray(int numWords,
                                                                       int maxFrequency)
Get the most frequent words sorted by frequency (descendent) in an ArrayList.

Parameters:
numWords - max number of words to retrieve, if numWords=0 then it will retrieve all the words in the list in descending order of frequency.
maxFreq - max frequency of a word to be considered in the list, if maxFrequency=0 it will retrieve all the words with frequency>=1.

printWordList

public void printWordList(java.lang.String fileName,
                          java.lang.String order,
                          int numWords,
                          int maxFrequency)
Parameters:
fileName - file to write the list
order - word or frequency
numWords - max number of words, if numWords=0 then it will retrieve all the words in the list.
maxFreq - max frequency of a word to be considered in the list, if maxFrequency=0 it will retrieve all the words with frequency>=1.

                              java.lang.String field,

id -

setUnwantedSentenceRecord

public void setUnwantedSentenceRecord(java.lang.String actualTableName,
                                      int id,
                                      boolean fieldValue)
This function updates the unwanted field as true/false of dbselection TABLE and selectedSentencesTable TABLE.
NOTE: use the actual table name: local + tableName + selectedsentences

Parameters:
actualTableName - including local and _selectedSentences
id - id in dbselection table
fieldValue - true/false

setTableDescription

public void setTableDescription(java.lang.String tableName,
                                java.lang.String description,
                                java.lang.String stopCriterion,
                                java.lang.String featuresDefinitionFileName,
                                java.lang.String covDefConfigFileName)
Set a description for table = name, it checks if the table tablesDescription exist, if not it creates it.

Parameters:
name - the name of the table, it can not be null
description - if no description set to null
stopCriterion - if no stopCriterion set to null
featuresDefinitionFileName - if no featuresDefinitionFileName set to null
covDefConfigFileName - if no covDefConfigFileNamen set to null

getTableDescription

public java.lang.String[] getTableDescription(java.lang.String tableName)
Get the description of the tableName

Parameters:
tableName -
Returns:
and String array where: desc[0] tableName desc[1] description desc[2] stopCriterion desc[3] featuresDefinitionFileName desc[4] featuresDefinitionFile desc[5] covDefConfigFileName desc[6] covDefConfigFile

mysqlEscapeCharacters

public java.lang.String mysqlEscapeCharacters(java.lang.String str)
The following characteres should be escaped: \0 An ASCII 0 (NUL) character. \' A single quote (') character. \" A double quote (") character.
